org.mini2Dx.core.screen

Class BasicScreenManager<T extends GameScreen>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.core.screen.BasicScreenManager<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameResizeListener, ScreenManager<T>

    public class BasicScreenManager<T extends GameScreen>
extends java.lang.Object
implements ScreenManager<T>
    A basic screen manager implementation based on Slick implementation by Kevin Glass
